name: BOT-NET
detailed_description:
BOT-NET is a VR FPS that allows for HMDs and Mobile devices to play together!



We solve the bottleneck of friends sitting around on the couch waiting for the latest "VR experience" to finish up.

BOT-NET brings your friends off that couch and into the battle with you!

This is a new paradigm in Cross-Platform multiplayer for PC VR and Mobile devices. Exclusive to 6DoF devices, BOT-NET will expand the access players have to spatial tracking gameplay. Use full positional tracking to dodge projectiles, stay in cover, and work your way through a broken matrix of artificial intelligence gone horribly wrong. The rogue BOT-NET are waging an endless war and you will need someone to watch your cover.

short_description: BOT-NET is a VR FPS that allows for HMDs and Mobile devices to play together! We solve the bottleneck of friends sitting around on the couch waiting for the latest "VR experience" to finish up. BOT-NET brings your friends off that couch and into the battle with you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greate
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
